title: Heart of the Mount Lavinia Apartments
location: No.19, Barnes Avenue, Mount Lavinia, Sri Lanka, Mount Lavinia
details:
Blue Ocean’s newest residential condominium project has been launched at No 19, Barnes Avenue, Mount Lavinia. The new project will comprise uniquely designed modern, luxury apartments with sophistication and elegance blended in tranquility at an elite tourist city in the heart of Mount Lavinia.

Blue Ocean at Barnes Avenue is a 7-storey, 18-unit condominium with a unique appearance. The completion of this project will be on time and ready for occupancy as per the schedule. Each apartment comprises two and three bedroom units including a spaciously furnished living room, pantry and dining room that guarantee a comfortable living for its occupants. The apartments are designed with modern architecture and interior amenities to suit the latest styles for a luxury living in a cosmopolitan setting. The neighborhood surrounded with 5 start hotels, Restaurants, Renowned Schools such as St. Thomas College, top class supermarkets, prestigious private schools and institutions and many more are within the walking distance from the Residencies.
